summary: Fixes the fuzzy textures especially for the female version.
descriptionHtml:
The AEARF fixes the fuzzy textures especially for the female version,
but also includes ebonymail and male versions:)
I could not understand why the female version had these strange fuzzy textures on them,
so i made my own mod with Gimp to fix that.

Be sure to delete \"Amazing Ebony Armor Redone\" or similar mod before installing this one...

Instal:
Copy files to skyrim directory...
author: cab95
